name: Super Ghosts 'n ... Ghosts? A 2D, Side-Scrolling, Shoot 'Em Up Game for XBOX 360 & PC
blurb: A 2D, wacky, action/comedy extravaganza,  featuring zombies, ninjas, jet pack-wearing pirates, 17 weapons, Online Co-Op, Achievements, and tons more!
